body_html: Note yhat if you are looking for the same behavior of TensorFlow, the implementation will not be that straighforward, because the number of pixels to add depend on the input size. See https://github.com/caffe2/caffe2/blob/master/caffe2/proto/caffe2_legacy.proto for reference
body_text: Note yhat if you are looking for the same behavior of TensorFlow, the implementation will not be that straighforward, because the number of pixels to add depend on the input size. See https://github.com/caffe2/caffe2/blob/master/caffe2/proto/caffe2_legacy.proto for reference
body: Note yhat if you are looking for the same behavior of TensorFlow, the implementation will not be that straighforward, because the number of pixels to add depend on the input size. See https://github.com/caffe2/caffe2/blob/master/caffe2/proto/caffe2_legacy.proto for reference
